languages.text: "Замолчи и целуй меня, {name}". {n}Кассия притягивает вас к себе, и золотое свечение прозрачной вуалью накрывает обоих. Мурашки на коже искрят бирюзой нетерпения, и бабочки разных цветов возникают из кораллового тумана вожделения и растворяются меж ваших тел.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Замолчи и целуй меня, {name}". {n}Кассия притягивает вас к себе, и золотое свечение прозрачной вуалью накрывает обоих. Мурашки на коже искрят бирюзой нетерпения, и бабочки разных цветов возникают из кораллового тумана вожделения и растворяются меж ваших тел.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hush, {name}, and kiss me." {n}Cassia pulls you close, and a golden glow falls over the two of you like a translucent veil. Your skin tingles with turquoise anticipation, and motes of every colour are born from the coral mist of desire and melt away somewhere between your bodies.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “别说话，{name}，吻我。”{n}卡西娅将你拉到身旁，金色的光芒如薄纱般落在你们的身上。你的皮肤因为绿松石色的期待而微微刺痛，五彩斑斓的蝴蝶从珊瑚色的爱欲迷雾中振翅而飞，又消融在交叠的身躯中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hush, {name}, and kiss me." {n}Cassia pulls you close, and a golden glow falls over the two of you like a translucent veil. Your skin tingles with turquoise anticipation, and motes of every colour are born from the coral mist of desire and melt away somewhere between your bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “别说话，{name}，吻我。”{n}卡西娅将你拉到身旁，金色的光芒如薄纱般落在你们的身上。你的皮肤因为绿松石色的期待而微微刺痛，五彩斑斓的蝴蝶从珊瑚色的爱欲迷雾中振翅起飞，又消融在交叠的身躯中。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sssch, {name}, küsst mich einfach." {n}Cassia zieht dich zu sich heran, und ein goldener Glanz legt sich über euch wie ein durchsichtiger Schleier. Deine Haut kribbelt vor türkiser Vorfreude, und Flecken sämtlicher Farben werden aus dem korallenen Nebel der Begierde geboren und schmelzen irgendwo zwischen euren Körpern dahin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hush, {name}, and kiss me." {n}Cassia pulls you close, and a golden glow falls over the two of you like a translucent veil. Your skin tingles with turquoise anticipation, and motes of every colour are born from the coral mist of desire and melt away somewhere between your bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sssch, {name}, küsst mich einfach." {n}Cassia zieht dich zu sich heran, und ein goldener Glanz legt sich über euch wie ein durchsichtiger Schleier. Deine Haut kribbelt vor türkiser Vorfreude, und Schmetterlinge sämtlicher Farben werden aus dem korallenen Nebel der Begierde geboren und schmelzen irgendwo zwischen euren Körpern dahin.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Taisez-vous, {name}, et embrassez-moi. » {n}Cassia vous attire vers elle et une lueur dorée vous recouvre tous les deux tel un voile translucide. Votre peau fourmille d'une attente turquoise et de petites taches de toutes les couleurs surgissent de la brume corail de désir pour se volatiliser entre vos corps.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hush, {name}, and kiss me." {n}Cassia pulls you close, and a golden glow falls over the two of you like a translucent veil. Your skin tingles with turquoise anticipation, and motes of every colour are born from the coral mist of desire and melt away somewhere between your bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Taisez-vous, {name}, et embrassez-moi. » {n}Cassia vous attire vers elle et une lueur dorée vous recouvre tous les deux tel un voile translucide. Votre peau fourmille d'une attente turquoise et des papillons de toutes les couleurs surgissent de la brume corail de désir pour se volatiliser entre vos corps.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Cállese, {name}, y béseme». {n}Cassia te acerca y un resplandor dorado cae sobre los dos como un velo traslúcido. Tu piel hormiguea con anticipación turquesa y motas de todos los colores nacen de la niebla coral del deseo y se funden en algún lugar de vuestros cuerpos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hush, {name}, and kiss me." {n}Cassia pulls you close, and a golden glow falls over the two of you like a translucent veil. Your skin tingles with turquoise anticipation, and motes of every colour are born from the coral mist of desire and melt away somewhere between your bodies.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cállese, {name}, y béseme». {n}Cassia te acerca y un resplandor dorado cae sobre los dos como un velo traslúcido. Tu piel hormiguea con anticipación turquesa y motas de todos los colores nacen de la niebla coral del deseo y se funden en algún lugar de vuestros cuerpos.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「静かにして、{name}様、そして口づけて」{n}カシアはあなたを引き寄せる。黄金の光があなたたち2人の頭上に、まるで半透明のヴェールのように降り注ぐ。あなたの肌はターコイズの期待にうずき、あらゆる色のきらめきが欲望のさんご色の霧から生まれ、2人の体の間のどこかで溶けて消える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hush, {name}, and kiss me." {n}Cassia pulls you close, and a golden glow falls over the two of you like a translucent veil. Your skin tingles with turquoise anticipation, and motes of every colour are born from the coral mist of desire and melt away somewhere between your bodies.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

Your skin tingles with turquoise anticipation, and motes of every colour are born from the coral mist of desire and melt away somewhere between your bodies.{/n}

languages.text: "Sus {name}. Sus da öp beni." {n}Cassia'nın seni kendine çekmesiyle altın renkli bir parıltı, ikinizin de üzerini bir tül gibi kaplıyor. Tenin turkuaz bir heyecanla ürperiyor. Arzunun mercan sisinden saçılan renk zerreleri, bedenlerinizin arasında bir yerde eriyip kayboluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hush, {name}, and kiss me." {n}Cassia pulls you close, and a golden glow falls over the two of you like a translucent veil. Your skin tingles with turquoise anticipation, and motes of every colour are born from the coral mist of desire and melt away somewhere between your bodies.{/n}
